metadata.name: omnipair
metadata.description: Oracless spot and margin money market protocol

accounts.name: receiver_program
docs: This program will be invoked via CPI

instructions.name: view_pair_data
docs: View instructions for client data access (Logs + RPC simulation to parse returned logs for values)
This approach allows for "view" functionality of on-chain calculations (similar to Solidity view functions)

errors.name: SlippageExceeded
errors.msg: Output amount below minimum requested (slippage exceeded)

errors.name: InsufficientBalance
errors.msg: User balance insufficient to cover requested amount

errors.name: OutputAmountOverflow
errors.msg: Math overflow during output amount calculation.

errors.name: CashReserveUnderflow
errors.msg: Math underflow during cash reserve calculation.

errors.name: LiquiditySqrtOverflow
errors.msg: Math overflow during liquidity square root calculation

errors.name: DebtShareMathOverflow
errors.msg: Math overflow during debt share calculation

errors.name: DebtShareDivisionOverflow
errors.msg: Math overflow during debt share division

errors.name: DebtUtilizationOverflow
errors.msg: Math overflow during debt utilization calculation

errors.name: InvalidDistribution
errors.msg: Invalid distribution - percentages must sum to 100%

errors.name: InvalidVaultSameAccount
errors.msg: Invalid vault - token_in_vault and token_out_vault must be different

errors.name: InvalidParamsHash
errors.msg: Invalid params hash - hash does not match computed parameters

errors.name: InvalidRateModel
errors.msg: Invalid rate model - rate_model does not match pair.rate_model

errors.name: InvalidPair
errors.msg: Invalid pair - pair does not match user_position.pair

errors.name: InvalidUtilBounds
errors.msg: Invalid utilization bounds - must satisfy: MIN <= start < end <= MAX

types.name: LastPriceEMA
docs: Tracks exponential moving averages (EMAs) for the last observed price.
- `symmetric`: standard two-way EMA (exponential price growth and decay)
- `directional`: one-way bottom-up asymmetric EMA (exponential price growth, but snaps instantly on price drops)

types.name: PairViewKind
docs: Enum for the different getters that can be emitted
This is used to eliminate off-chain calculations / simulation

constants.name: NAD
docs: NAD: Nine-decimal fixed point unit (1e9 scaling), similar to WAD (1e18) by Maker.

constants.name: TARGET_MS_PER_SLOT
docs: The nominal slot duration in milliseconds.
